decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building is used).

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the northern and southern wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extension and outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 23, Burns Way, Heston.

Condition : 6 - The windows formed in the southern elevation of the outbuilding shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extension and detached single storey playroom to rear of dwellinghouse.
